Articles.Content:
My problem is when toy change the part variant to LF/LFO it changes in the right click menu/box but it doesn't add any fuel. I have already done a fresh install of it and still doesn't work. Thats when building a new craft, if I load up an older craft I have already built the fuel registers. I have tried everything short of deleting and reinstalling all of my mods, which I really don't want to do. Any help or suggestions to fix this will be greatly appreciated. Here's a link to a pic to show what I mean. [http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j353/Gregali46290/screenshot73_zpsyjmhlfwo.png](http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j353/Gregali46290/screenshot73_zpsyjmhlfwo.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T19:15:37Z" title="04/23/2015 07:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by Gregali46290**
Fuel in B9 parts is managed with fsfuelswitch, make sure the latest version of firespitter.dll is installed
Already did that, did help sadley....
You're not using [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114719-Part-ZOMBIE-Zombie-is-One-More-B9-Inspired-Expansion-v0-2-%282015-04-07%29) mod as well, are you?

Ok, well that mod caused a similar issue with the Real Fuels config that was included with it.

So I'd suspect that one of your other mods is causing a similar issue
